verses.roman:
jaya jaya śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya-nityānanda
jayādvaitacandra jaya gaura-bhakta-vṛnda

synonyms: jaya jaya—all glories; śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya—to Lord Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nityānanda—Lord Nityānanda; jaya advaita-candra—all glories to Advaita Prabhu; jaya—all glories; gaura-bhakta-vṛnda—to the devotees of Lord Caitanya, headed by Śrīvāsa.
translation: All glories to Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu and Lord Nityānanda! All glories to Advaita Prabhu, and all glories to the devotees of Lord Caitanya, headed by Śrīvāsa!
